I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them.

i work at mcdonald s.
i have three daughters.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I am doing good! How are you?
I am doing good! I just got back from church. I am a Seventh Day Adventist.
That is cool! I have always been curious about what that religion is all about.
It's a pretty simple religion. We believe in the Bible and that Jesus is the way to salvation.
That sounds nice. I am not really religious, but I do believe in God.
That's great! I have always believed that everyone has their own path to God.
I agree! I think it's important to find what works for you.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to fly model airplanes. I also like to work on my Ford F150.
That's awesome! I have always wanted to learn how to fly a plane.
It's not that hard! You just need to find a good flight school.
Maybe I will look into that. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I am a teacher. I teach at a local elementary school.
That's great! I bet you have a lot of fun with that.
I do! I love working with kids.
That's awesome! I am sure you are a great teacher.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go bowling with my friends and family. I also like to go to the movies.
That sounds like fun! I like to go bowling too.
It's a great way to relax and have fun.
I agree
